member.name: M:AssetManagement.Server.Components.AssetTable.OnAssetUpdated
member.summary: Callback for AssetUpdate event that occurs in AssetService. Updates table with new data - live reloading.

member.summary: Callback function fired when the page is changed. Updates the pageAssets array.
member.param: Sliced array of assets representing a page.

member.name: M:AssetManagement.Server.Components.AssetTable.NavigateToDetails(AssetManagement.DataAccessLibrary.DataModels.Computer)
member.summary: Opens the details page for an asset in a new page.

member.name: P:AssetManagement.Server.Shared.PageNavigator`1.PageIndex
member.summary: The current page index number starting at 0.

member.name: E:AssetManagement.Server.Shared.PageNavigator`1.PageChanged
member.summary: Event that fires when the page changes.

member.name: M:AssetManagement.Server.Shared.PageNavigator`1.#ctor(`0[],`0[]@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor to initialize TableNavigator which outputs pageItems.
member.param: Output array with sliced items of size itemsPerPage.
The number of items to display on a single page.

member.name: M:AssetManagement.Server.Shared.PageNavigator`1.ChangePage(AssetManagement.Server.Shared.HorizontalDirection)
member.summary: Changes the shown items depending on which direction is chosen and invokes the event PageChanged.
member.param: The direction to navigate - left or right.
member.returns: True if the requested page index was inside the bounds, false if it was clamped.

member.name: M:AssetManagement.Server.Shared.PageNavigator`1.OnItemsUpdated(`0[])
member.summary: Updates current page and returns current page items. Should be called if the current page is updated.

member.name: M:AssetManagement.Server.Shared.PageNavigator`1.SetPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the current page index to a specific value. Invokes the PageChanged event.
member.param: The page index to move to. Gets clamped between 0 and the number of pages.
member.returns: True if the page was updated, false if it wasn't.

member.name: M:AssetManagement.Server.Shared.PageNavigator`1.GetPageItems
member.summary: Slices items into a size of itemsPerPage and returns them as an item array.
member.returns: Array of items given the current page.
